```{r}
library(tigris)
library(terra)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(tidyverse)
options(tigris_use_cache = TRUE)
```

```{r}
for(fip in c(17, 18, 26, 39, 55)) {
  tracts = tigris::tracts(fip, cb = T, year = 2021)
  if(fip == 17) {
    all_tracts = tracts
  } else {
    all_tracts = rbind(all_tracts, tracts)
  }
}

counties = tigris::counties(state = c(17, 18, 26, 39, 55), cb = T, year = 2021)
```
